samophis.lavalink.client.entities

Interface AudioNode


  • public interface AudioNode
    Represents a remote, independent audio-sending node running Lavalink Server that the client connects to.

    Upon creation, LavaClient attempts to open a new connection to the node. Unlike the JDA Client, LavaClient will keep trying to reconnect to nodes unless the server closes the connection with close-code 1000, or until the client manually closes the connection.

    Since:
    0.1
    Author:
    SamOphis

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      LoadBalancer getBalancer()
      Fetches the not-null LoadBalancer that is responsible for determining the penalty imposed on the node.
      LavaClient getClient()
      Returns the not-null LavaClient associated with this node object.
      AudioNodeEntry getEntry()
      Returns the actual, not-null entry used to create this node object.
      com.neovisionaries.ws.client.WebSocket getSocket()
      Returns the raw, not-null, third-party WebSocket connection to the node.
      Statistics getStatistics()
      Fetches the possibly-null Statistics data sent from this specific node, updated every minute.
      boolean isAvailable()
      Returns whether or not the WebSocket connection is open (available).
      boolean isUsingLavalinkVersionThree()
      Returns whether or not this node is running Lavalink v3 based on response headers from the initial connection.

    • Method Detail

      • getClient

        @Nonnull
LavaClient getClient()
        Returns the not-null LavaClient associated with this node object.
        Returns:
        The associated LavaClient.

      • getSocket

        @Nonnull
com.neovisionaries.ws.client.WebSocket getSocket()
        Returns the raw, not-null, third-party WebSocket connection to the node.

        It's advised that you seriously don't mess with this unless you know exactly what you are doing!

        Returns:
        The not-null WebSocket connection.

      • getBalancer

        @Nonnull
LoadBalancer getBalancer()
        Fetches the not-null LoadBalancer that is responsible for determining the penalty imposed on the node.
        Returns:
        The not-null LoadBalancer.

      • getStatistics

        @Nullable
Statistics getStatistics()
        Fetches the possibly-null Statistics data sent from this specific node, updated every minute.

        When initially connecting and for a short time afterwards this object may be null.

        Returns:
        The possibly-null Statistics data updated every minute.

      • getEntry

        @Nonnull
AudioNodeEntry getEntry()
        Returns the actual, not-null entry used to create this node object.
        Returns:
        The entry data used to create the node.

      • isAvailable

        boolean isAvailable()
        Returns whether or not the WebSocket connection is open (available).
        Returns:
        Whether or not the WebSocket connection is open.

      • isUsingLavalinkVersionThree

        boolean isUsingLavalinkVersionThree()
        Returns whether or not this node is running Lavalink v3 based on response headers from the initial connection.
        Returns:
        Whether or not this node is running Lavalink v3.
